title: Cream Cheese and Crab Sushi Rolls Recipe
description: This crab sushi roll with imitation crabmeat recipe is delicious and surprisingly simple to make. Roll up sushi with crab, cream cheese, and cucumber.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Appetizers and Snacks Wraps and Rolls Cream Cheese and Crab Sushi Rolls 4.6 (49) 34 Reviews 15 Photos This crab sushi roll with imitation crabmeat recipe is delicious and surprisingly simple to make. Sushi is expensive to buy at the supermarket, so making your own will save you tons of money. My husband is a sushi freak! I make this for him all the time. Submitted by Samantha Updated on May 8, 2023 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 15 15 15 15 Prep Time: 20 mins Cook Time: 20 mins Total Time: 40 mins Servings: 2 Yield: 2 sushi rolls Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 2 servings 1 cup uncooked white rice 2 cups water 2 tablespoons rice vinegar 1 teaspoon salt 2 sheets nori seaweed sheets ¼ cucumber, peeled and sliced lengthwise 2 pieces imitation crab legs ½ (3 ounce) package cream cheese, sliced 1 teaspoon minced fresh ginger root Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bring rice and water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the rice is tender, and the liquid has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes. Stir in rice vinegar and salt. Allow to cool completely. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Lay out seaweed sheets. Moisten hands with water, then spread cooled rice evenly on each sheet, leaving a 1/2-inch gap along one edge, lengthwise. Arrange strips of cucumber, imitation crabmeat, and cream cheese on top of the rice in a straight line along the side opposite the gap. Roll up sushi from the toppings to the seaweed sheet's exposed end. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Using a sharp wet knife, slice each roll into 5 or 6 pieces. Serve with minced ginger on the side. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 87 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Cream Cheese and Crab Sushi Rolls 01 of 15 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 15 Photo by  Laticia Jackson 02/08/2021 It was my first time making sushi rolls and it was a hit at home!! This is a great recipe. 03 of 15 Photo by  Andrea McAfee 01/18/2021 04 of 15 Photo by  Payton 07/27/2020 05 of 15 Photo by  KyRich 01/19/2019 06 of 15 Photo by  Dexter Alcala 09/14/2017 Amazing! Great recipe! I made some personal modifications by adding some temporary shrimp but was amazing! 07 of 15 Photo by  Dexter Alcala 09/14/2017 Amazing! Great recipe! I made some personal modifications by adding some temporary shrimp but was amazing! 08 of 15 Photo by  James 04/13/2017 This a good recipe and I've made it many times with varying vegetables and using sticky rice. Include some condiments such as pickled ginger, soy sauce, and wasabi. 09 of 15 Photo by  Sharon 11/25/2016 10 of 15 Photo by  Christina 07/26/2016 Loved this! Great combo of flavors...a definite keeper~YUM!
